intro:
Two pictures
One challenge
Can you find it?
description:
Find Difference is a fun and relaxing puzzle game where every scene hides carefully crafted changes. Look closely, think fast and discover every difference before time runs out!

Features:
• Enjoy dozens of beautifully illustrated levels
• Spot the differences between two pictures
• Relax with simple and intuitive controls
• Unlock new scenes as you progress
• Suitable for all ages — perfect for quick play sessions

Challenge your eyes sharpen your focus and see how many differences you can find!

Are you ready to spot them all?
